effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Applied Chronometrics
features.flavor: Time slows down around you. Your heartbeat is the only gauge of the extra moments you've gained.

effects.tier1: You target two creatures, one of which can be you.
effects.tier2: You target three creatures, one of which can be you.
effects.tier3: You target four creatures, one of which can be you.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each target gains a +5 bonus to speed, they can't be made dazed, and they can use an additional maneuver on their turn. If a target is already dazed, that condition ends for them.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect:
Your speed is halved until the end of the encounter.
###### Slow (5 Clarity)
*Perhaps they wonder why everyone else is moving so quickly?*

effects.tier1: The target's speed is halved (save ends), or if P < WEAK, the target is slowed (save ends).
effects.tier2: The target is slowed (save ends), or if P < AVERAGE, the target's speed is 0 (save ends).
effects.tier3: The target is slowed (save ends), or if P < STRONG, the target's speed is 0 (save ends).

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target can't use triggered actions while their speed is reduced this way.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: The potency of this ability increases by 1 and you take 1d6 damage. At the start of each combat round while any target is affected by this ability, you take 1d6 damage. You can end the effect on all affected targets at any time (no action required).
